name: UpdateVisitorInfo
description:
Update an existing visitor's information in Intercom.

Use this tool to update a visitor's information by providing their `user_id` or `id`. It sends a PUT request to modify the visitor's details in Intercom's system.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use. Options: '1.0' to '2.9'.

parameters.name: visitor_update_payload
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the `id` or `user_id` of the visitor, optionally with `name` and `custom_attributes` to update their information.

id.description: A unique identified for the visitor which is given by Intercom.

user_id.description: A unique identified for the visitor which is given by you.

custom_attributes.description: The custom attributes which are set for the visitor.
